name: Bathroom Escape (iMakeStuffSC)
description:
JUMP SCARE WARNING!

You wake up in a bathroom that you do not know. The place feels like a house, but has some unusual stuff. The exit door has some puzzles to get through. There are boards on the door, a paper shredder and a remote-controlled lock. How will you get out?

A spooky point-and-click inspired game. Avoid being loud while you escape the bathroom quickly. Someone else is in the building... And they are not human...

Press and hold SPACE to view the thermal camera, click on the light switch to pause the game, press E to open and close inventory.
